DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effect of different VPT methods using Calcium Enriched Mixture (CEM) cement for management of human dental pulp with irreversible pulpitis.
DOC.brief_title: Vital Pulp Therapy (VPT) Using Calcium Enriched Mixture (CEM) to Treat Irreversible Pulpitis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this randomized clinical trial is to demonstrate the effect of four methods of Vital Pulp Therapy (VPT) using a new endodontic bio-material [calcium enriched mixture (CEM) cement] in pain relief as well as clinical/radiographic success, for management of irreversible pulpitis of human permanent teeth.
